Text:
You're...Shadow...? The leader...of the Shadow
Garden?!

Impossible, a kid like you...? But...this aura of
magic you're giving off...
You're...no ordinary individual!

Hmm... Nice stance. Seems like you're somewhat
capable.

So, you were lying in wait for me as I tried to
escape...! The Shadow Garden...truly are
formidable opponents!

(A thief who doesn't judge by appearances? Gotta be
a first. Yup, nice to have a curveball like this every
now and then.)

(His appearance is hard to place as well, neither
fully a thief nor a knight...more like a bandit who
stole some armor. Not bad at all.)

(A top-tier mountaineer-slash-bandit generously
shared by Alpha... I'll gladly use him to highlight
my "shadowbroker" prowess!)

Running away, were you? I see. Looking to regroup
for a rematch with the Shadow Garden, huh?
But...your "rematch" will never come.
*gasp*

I-Impossible... This kid...! The density of his
magic feels like it's been compressed...!

Compared to those girls...he's...on an entirely
different level!
Tch!!
Gather beneath me! Come!!!
Hmm...?
Grrraaaarghhhhhh!!!

(Seriously? Straight to relying on monsters? Typical
thief move to pull something like this from the
start!)

(And, yup, these are the dragons Delta mentioned she
was gonna hunt... Who would've thought they could be
tamed like this!)

(Oh well...better than him begging for mercy right
off the bat. Besides, an opening act like this is
always welcome.)
Malaks! Tear that brat apart!
Grrraaahhh!
Heh... Try if you can...!
Swish, swish, swish, swish, swiiish!!!
Quick, before it regenerates!
Deal a fatal blow!

Ack... I can't believe it won't die after being
sliced up so much...!

Well, it is a dragon after all...but this should
immobilize it for a while!
...Heheh...
This dragon...has short legs.
So, if I go like this—

If the ground beneath them is too soft, they can't
leverage their strength...!
Now!
Hey! Cut it out, you dumb dog!
Kitty cat! Don't steal my prey!
You're the one who just barged in!
Woooshrrraaahhh!!!
I win! I'm the dragon slayer! Kitty cat loses!
S-Seriously, you're doing this right now?

Well, I guess if Master Shadow is here, it's just
business as usual...!
...Time to finish this!

She took it out with a single blow...! She's lethal
on another level compared to when she defeated
me...!

It's not just Lady Alpha. The power of all the Seven
Shadows has clearly increased!

Does just knowing Master Shadow is here change
everything so drastically...?
Yes! That's exactly right!

Come on, No. 111! No. 122! Let's take this one down
too!
Swish, swish, swish, swish, swiiish!!!

No. 111! No. 122! Support Gamma and make sure she
doesn't overextend herself!
Yes, ma'am!
Roger that!

Thanks to Shadow drawing away Sergey and five of the
Malaks, we can fight the rest of the horde without
any interference.

In other words, our reliance on his strength shows
our inexperience and lack of power...

Still, knowing that he watches over us...allows us
to fight while basking in that happiness and warmth!
...There!
Wh-What...?!

Impossible! A single slash powerful enough to
surpass Malak's regenerative abilities over such a
vast area...?!
Heh... It's nothing special.

A horde of dragons, controlled by some means, moves
uniformly and systematically—

When it comes to creatures that have lost their wild
nature and are under control, it's easy to identify
patterns in their group behavior.

So, by observing the synchronization of their
movements, a single strike across them is
enough to settle everything...

What is this sword technique of yours...? It's not
the "Pierce" Bushin style...!

If you're also a dark knight, then show me. Use your
sword to carve out your fate and fight back.
You're...a monster...!

...Against a monster...only the power of another
monster can prevail...!
...I cannot...die here...!
Hmm...?
Aaaaaagghhh!!!
...Did he just eat...dragon flesh...?
U-Ughh... Aaargh!!!
I-I...will not...be...defeated...!!!
Graaaaaarrrrr...!

An explosive surge of magic... So this is the power
that lies within dragon flesh, huh?

Feeding on foul-smelling flesh and blood to
transform yourself into some sort of dragon...

As far as last-ditch attempts of desperation go,
it's not the most honorable move...
Saaaaay...whaaat you will...!
I...will never...be defeated...!!!

...Your stance has become more refined through
simplification. It's an aggressive style of
swordsmanship that maximizes your newfound
strength and speed.

In that case, I'll use traditional swordsmanship...
and face you head-on!
